about_the_game:
Embark on an epic deckbuilding adventure in this ancient mystical world, with a captivating blend of strategy, ancient magic, and malevolent creatures. Backdraft offers a unique and immersive experience for fans of indie games and deckbuilding enthusiasts. With its stunning hand-painted artwork, immersive soundscapes, and deep strategic gameplay, Backdraft is a must-play for fans of deckbuilding games and fantasy adventures. Forge your legacy as you confront the ultimate challenge, where your choices will determine the destiny of Arcadia itself.

Explore the depths of Arcadia, from forgotten ruins to ethereal landscapes, each offering its own secrets and challenges. As darkness looms over the realms, you are entrusted with the strenuous task of restoring balance and harmony. Draft your cards with precision, harnessing the raw power of fire, light, and nature. Craft a deck that reflects your unique playstyle, combining synergistic abilities and deadly combos.
